000606.SZ.summary: Shunliban Information Service Co.,Ltd engages in the enterprise Internet service business in China. It provides enterprise registration, finance and taxation, intellectual property, investment and financing, and problem solving services in the process of enterprise development. The company also provides modern enterprise services, such as standard and customized advisory services; and user services, professional service factory, cooperative services, service station outlets, and offline service support systems. In addition, it operates online service platform that provides knowledge, application, e-commerce, service, resource, and data cloud services combined with offline service system, as well as open cloud and cloud computing services; and provides smart enterprise services, such as enterprise insurance, procurement, and marketing, as well as service insurance and corporate finance services. The company was formerly known as Shenzhou Yiqiao Information Service Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shunliban Information Service Co.,Ltd in June 2018. Shunliban Information Service Co.,Ltd was founded in 1996 and is based in Beijing, China.

000676.SZ.summary: Genimous Technology Co., Ltd. engages in Internet media and digital marketing businesses in China and internationally. It offers mobile advertising trading platform; and integrated digital marketing, media strategy, communication strategy, media buying, socialized marketing, search engine marketing, traffic docking, and entertainment marketing services. The company also develops App China, a local android-based application store, which connects users with developers; and cross-platform solutions that connects advertisers and software developers. In addition, it engages in Internet games and Internet finance businesses. The company was formerly known as Genimous Investment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Genimous Technology Co., Ltd. in August 2016. Genimous Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Beijing, China.

000889.SZ.summary: ZJBC Information Technology Co., Ltd, through its subsidiaries, primarily provides information intelligent transmission services in China. The company also offers communication network maintenance services, such as operation management, fault repair, and routine maintenance for network resources owned by communication operators and tower companies. In addition, it provides business process outsourcing services for financial institutions, including banks. The company was formerly known as Maoye Communication and Network Co., Ltd. ZJBC Information Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 1997 and is based in Qinhuangdao, China.

000948.SZ.summary: Yunnan Nantian Electronics Information Co.,Ltd., an IT company, provides hardware and software products and solutions to banking/financial industry in China. It offers dot matrix printers; card readers, information interactive terminals, camera scanners, and other smart banking solutions; ribbon cartridges; mobile banking tablets, video teller machines, cashless ATMs, kiosk modules, card dispenser kiosks, and other self-services kiosks; thermal printers and modules; and spare parts. The company also provides data center services and integrated solutions; payment products and solutions to telecom operators, third-party payment providers, and financial institutions; software development and system integration services in the areas of utilities, water reservation system, telecommunications, scientific studies, government, authorities, and national defense; and consultancy and outsourcing services. Yunnan Nantian Electronics Information Co.,Ltd. is headquartered in Kunming, China.

000971.SZ.summary: Gosun Holding Co., Ltd. provides integrated cloud infrastructure solutions and services for the government and enterprise industries, and Internet customers in China and internationally. It offers Internet data center services, static Website acceleration services, download acceleration services, streaming acceleration services, cloud assessment, cloud monitoring, and cloud acceleration services. The company also provides online game, online software, and online video industry solutions, as well as e-commerce Website solutions. It serves various customers, including finance, insurance, radio and television, Internet service providers, electricity providers, portals, streaming media, cloud computing, and government agencies. The company was formerly known as Hubei Landing Holding Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Gosun Holding Co., Ltd. in November 2015. Gosun Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002093.SZ.summary: Guomai Technologies, Inc. provides telecommunications outsourcing services in China. The company offers network operation and maintenance services, including network health checks, routine maintenance technical support, network monitoring, network quality analysis and evaluation, network adjustment optimization and upgrade, network construction and rectification, network signal distribution and coverage, network equipment maintenance, spare parts, update and emergency communications support, data storage backup and analysis, traffic model statistical analysis, and other services. It also provides design consulting services, such as telecom market research, business development strategy, network status analysis, business needs analysis, network development planning, network evolution strategy, network engineering survey and design, and investment and benefit assessment services, as well as 2G/3G mobile core network, wireless network, IP bearer network, optical transmission network, and IT systems services. In addition, the company offers business process and human resource outsourcing services. Further, it provides telecom network integration services comprising network integration, integrated supervision, renewal, network generation and optimization, technical support, application development, channel construction, brand promotion, and certification training services. Additionally, the company offers education and training services consisting of telecom business operations, project management, technical, certification, and other training services. Guomai Technologies, Inc. was founded in 1996 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

002368.SZ.summary: Taiji Computer Corporation Limited provides information technology services primarily in China. The company designs and constructs information systems; and provides consulting, infrastructure, strategic planning, system design, software development, system integration, operation and maintenance outsourcing, and other value added services, as well as industry solutions for integrated IT service systems. It also offers smart city integration, public safety, intelligent building management, data center, and information security solutions. The company serves various industries, such as government, finance, energy, manufacturing, and public utilities. Taiji Computer Corporation Limited was founded in 1987 and is based in Beijing, China.

002421.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Das Intellitech Co., Ltd. provides intelligent building and energy management solutions in China. The company offers central air-conditioning energy management systems; central air-conditioning energy saving control systems; C3 card systems; and smart home products, access control products and accessories, and consumer and attendance products. It also offers energy monitoring and management platform for urban buildings; metro integrated monitoring software system for rail transit lines; and community integrated management platform. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002642.SZ.summary: Ronglian Group Ltd. provides IT solutions in China and internationally. It provides infrastructure and data center solutions, such as IT planning, application and system integration, professional operation and maintenance, and specialized services; virtualization, and private and hybrid cloud services; and B2B, smart city, and operation services. The company also offers enterprise cloud services, such as cloud planning and design, service migration, resource management, integration development, and operation monitoring services, as well as industry cloud solutions, such as insurance, exploration, and education. In addition, it provides Internet of Vehicles ecosystem through specialized hardware and software products, business platforms, and data services; Internet of Water solution to control leakage and venting, and ensure water quality safety; big data storage, data visualization, and data application solutions; and smart news solutions. Further, the company offers bio-data platform and biological cloud, and hospital and healthcare management solutions. It serves the energy, transportation, telecom, media, finance, insurance, government, education, manufacturing, biological, and healthcare industries. The company was formerly known as UEC Group Ltd. Ronglian Group Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, China.

002649.SZ.summary: Beyondsoft Corporation provides IT consulting, solutions, and services worldwide. The company offers analytics services, such as management consulting, big data and business intelligence, and service desk; DevOps automation tool; and digital architecture and development, Web and cloud operations, interactive portfolio management, and interactive strategy services. It also provides enterprise mobility, UX design, mobile app development, and mobile testing services; and enterprise strategy and transformation, business process, digitalization, technology strategy and architecture, enterprise application, and accessibility services. In addition, the company offers product engineering, product lifecycle management, product design, software development, globalization and localization, and verification and validation services; and application development and maintenance, testing, management, and enterprise integration services. Further, it provides testing consulting and TCOE, test development and engineering, security testing, and G11N/L10N testing services; and infrastructure management services, such as architecture and deployment, managed infrastructure, operation and support, and security services. The company serves various industries, such as BFSI, technology, Internet, retail, telecom, manufacturing, automobile, media, energy, healthcare, travel, and logistics. Beyondsoft Corporation was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002771.SZ.summary: Beijing Transtrue Technology Inc. provides information technology and integrated multimedia video solutions in the areas of energy, government, finance, transportation, education, and others in China. The company's multimedia information systems include integrated communication systems, VR simulation systems, multi-functional conference systems, remote cooperation systems, conference management systems, and dynamic environment monitoring systems; and production monitoring and emergency command systems comprise emergency plan Pcals, surveillance and warning systems, exercise systems, security systems, and command systems. It also provides consultation, design, research and development, integration, and other services; one-stop cloud data center services; and data visualization services. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002912.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Sinovatio Technology Co., Ltd. provides intelligent management and security protection solutions for communication and information networks worldwide. The company offers network and machine data visualization products, such as data aggregation and distribution management products for broadband Internet; data collection and data analysis products for mobile access networks; machine data collection products; network content security products for international markets; big data operation platform, etc., as well as DPI products and business intelligence enterprise solutions. It also provides technical solution consulting services; project implementation supporting services; remote technical support services; onsite fault handling technical services; technical material services; software upgrade services; network regular inspection services; onsite duty support services; and technical training services. The company serves government, operators, and industry customers. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Sinovatio Technology Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Sinovatio Technology Co., Ltd. in March 2015. Shenzhen Sinovatio Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002987.SZ.summary: Northking Information Technology Co., Ltd. provides information technology outsourcing (ITO) and business process outsourcing (BPO) services to financial institutions in China and internationally. The company's ITO service offers product platforms and tools, channel class solution, Internet finance solutions, image process solutions, test class solutions, financial institution business management and business decision systems, business solutions, and financial institution operational risk and compliance management solutions, as well as human resources outsourcing services. It also offers BPO services related to credit card and loan credit verification, data entry, business processing, business marketing, cash business, lobby service, file outsourcing, bank card business, e-commerce operation, financial sharing processing, call service processing, human resources outsourcing, insurance business, process banking business centralized processing, and e-banking auxiliary processing. The company is headquartered in Beijing, China.

003005.SZ.summary: Beijing Jingyeda Technology Co.,Ltd. provides system integration services. The company engages in the development, application, and service of industry information systems. It offers IT information consulting services in the areas of business design, system planning, solutions, engineering implementation, custom development, operation and maintenance, etc.; and educational training services. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Beijing, China.

003007.SZ.summary: Beijing ZZNode Technologies Co., Ltd., a software company, provides telecommunications and IT operation management products and solutions in China. It primarily offers telecom operation support software and services. The company serves radio and television, railway, financial, and other industries. Beijing ZZNode Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

003029.SZ.long_name: Jilin University Zhengyuan Information Technologies Co., Ltd.
003029.SZ.summary: Jilin University Zhengyuan Information Technologies Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of information security products in China. It primarily offers electronic invoicing platform, as well as security consulting, security integration, and industrial application development services. The company also provides security compliance requirements in the process of electronic invoicing, delivery, inspection, reimbursement, and accounting. Jilin University Zhengyuan Information Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China.

0354.HK.summary: Chinasoft International Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops and provides information technology (IT) solutions, IT outsourcing, and training services. It operates through Technical Professional Services Group and Internet IT Services Group segments. The company offers CloudEasy, a cloud management platform; Huaxia Cloud, a cloud brokerage platform; Tencent Cloud that provides cloud consultation, migration, operation and maintenance management, and application development and integration; enterprise cloud disk; and cloud shop O2O platform, as well as ResourceOne, TopLink/TSA+, and Ark big data middleware platforms. It also provides IT application development and maintenance, IT testing, infrastructure management, product development and services, digital consulting and implementation, system integration and services, IT consulting and outsourcing, business process outsourcing, and other customer services. In addition, the company offers Internet IT services comprising software industry Internet platform, SaaS, and shared services; and trades in software and hardware products. It serves financial institution, banks, insurance and securities, retail, telecommunications and Internet, high-technology business, manufacturing, transportation, public utilities, and other industries, as well as to the government in the People's Republic of China, the United States, Japan, Malaysia, India, and internationally. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

0465.HK.summary: Futong Technology Development Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides enterprise information technology (IT) infrastructure products, services, and solutions; cloud computing products; and intelligent digitalized application products in the People's Republic of China and Hong Kong. It also offers system integration services. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China. Futong Technology Development Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of China Group Associates Limited.

0696.HK.summary: TravelSky Technology Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides information technology solutions for aviation and travel industry in the People's Republic of China. It primarily offers aviation information technology (AIT), distribution information technology, accounting, settlement, and clearing services. The company's AIT services consist of electronic travel distribution services, including inventory control system, computer reservation system, and airport passenger processing system services, as well as other related information technology solutions. It also provides cargo management services, as well as sells and installs related information systems; computer hardware and software development, and data network services; and computer system engineering design and installation services. TravelSky Technology Limited was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

1075.HK.summary: Capinfo Company Limited provides information technology (IT) services in the People's Republic of China. It offers online application and system integration, software development, data processing, information professional, IT planning and consulting, IT construction implementation, IT operation and maintenance, IT outsourcing, and value added services. The company also provides various industry solutions, including e-government, health care, community service, urban transportation, housing fund, public security, and cloud service solutions. Capinfo Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

1147.HK.summary: Edensoft Holdings Limited operates as an integrated IT solution and cloud services provider in the People's Republic of China. It provides IT infrastructure, IT implementation and supporting, and cloud services, as well as maintenance services. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

1900.HK.summary: China ITS (Holdings) Co., Ltd., an investment holding company, provides products, specialised solutions, and services related to infrastructure technology in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It operates through Railway Business and Electric Power Business segments. The Railway Business segment offers specialised solutions, including railway communication products and energy-base products. This segment also provides maintenance services, network optimization and network planning, and technical consulting for the products related to the communication system for railway customers. The Electric Power Business segment offers products and specialised solutions related to electric power equipment for customers in the electric power infrastructure construction area, including power transmission and transformation equipment, power generation equipment, etc. This segment also provides planning and technical consulting services of the infrastructure construction in relation to electric power, such as power plant construction and power grid renovation; and value-added operation and services related to power plant investment, construction and operation, etc. The company also engages in the real estate development and commercial properties leasing activities; sale of electronics; and power supply activities. In addition, it provides technology, communications, and surveillance specialised solutions, as well as internet information technology services; and intelligent transportation system services. China ITS (Holdings) Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

300010.SZ.summary: Doushen (Beijing) Education & Technology INC. provides education and information security services in China. It offers education cloud platforms, smart campus solutions and disciplinary application products in the field of K12 that target B-end users; and college entrance exam consulting services, overseas education consulting services, and online tutoring that target C-end users. The company's information security business include data security solutions, such as full data lifecycle, and industrial control security products and solutions, as well as autonomous and controllable products and solutions targeting various industries. It also provides education services for schools and educational institutions at various levels, including top-level design, consulting planning, curriculum construction, big data analysis, software development, educational resources and model research, and education; and space development, hardware support, system integration, and operation and maintenance outsourcing services. In addition, the company offers artificial intelligence technology solutions consisting of emotion calculation, identity recognition, natural language understanding, and other intelligent classroom teaching analysis; various solutions and technical services for offline classroom teaching, online one-to-one teaching, and professional scenes. The company was formerly known as Beijing Lanxum Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Doushen (Beijing) Education & Technology INC. in August 2020. Doushen (Beijing) Education & Technology INC. was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China.

300182.SZ.summary: Beijing Jetsen Technology Co., Ltd. provides audio and video technology, and film and TV content production and copyright operation services. It offers copyright operation, as well as digital culture, education, and technology products. The company provides audio and video technology solutions in the domestic radio and television, press and publication, new media, and relevant industry applications; and technology, media asset management, information security, intelligent monitoring, and media central kitchen systems. It serves TV stations, cable operators, video Websites, teleco companies, and other institutions. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Beijing, China.

300245.SZ.summary: Shanghai DragonNet Technology Co.,Ltd. provides IT services and solutions in China and internationally. The company offers IT maintenance services; IT outsourcing services; IT professional services; and preventive inspection, technical support, fault resolution, component replacement, and other support services. It also provides range of products, such as PhegData data storage cloud platform, Phydata all-flash array, Phegda server, Phegda SSD, big data marketing service, big data application platform construction, zhuozhilian solution, PBData database machine, remanufacturing equipment, Pridata Private Cloud Platform, PCloud-DCOS, PCloud-open stack, cloud data center construction consulting, and next generation flexible data center services. Shanghai DragonNet Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

300271.SZ.summary: Beijing Thunisoft Co., Ltd. provides software and information services to the government and enterprise customers in China. It provides consulting services for clients in various industries, such as courts, procuratorates, the judiciary, government, political and legal committees, taxation, etc. The company also offers products for courts, procuratorates, prisons, fiscal tax, market supervision, financial and health, general office, foundation support, and business intelligence. In addition, it provides consulting planning, project management, system integration, software development, professional training, application promotion, project quality assurance, and operation and maintenance services. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300277.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Hirisun Technology Incorporated engages in power information system integration business in China. It offers electric power production information systems for production, dispatching, design, planning, and infrastructure applications; drawing management systems; production conference systems; power communication production management systems; content management platforms; network political systems; and administrative logistics systems. The company also offers communication products, including integrate voice, video, and data communications; and communication solutions, such as optical transmission network, power distribution communication network, local access network, IP routing switching network, local area network, and other networks; application integration solutions. Its products and services are used in the power industry, chain power generation, transmission, transformation, distribution, power consumption and dispatching, etc. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300287.SZ.summary: Beijing Philisense Technology Co., Ltd. provides solutions for digital cities in China. Its products include digital cable conference and wireless digital conference products; matrix switching and processing equipment; multimedia information display devices; interpretation systems; meeting check-in equipment; electronic ticket box equipment; digital sound reinforcement equipment; system host products; and software, security, LED, and Internet of Things products. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Beijing, China.

300290.SZ.long_name: Bringspring Science and Technology Co., Ltd.
300290.SZ.summary: Bringspring Science and Technology Co., Ltd. focuses on health data and cloud services in China. It provides cloud computing, big data, Internet of Things, and artificial intelligence services. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Shenyang, China.

300297.SZ.summary: Bluedon Information Security Technologies Co.,Ltd. provides information security solutions in China. The company offers physical and industrial control, network and application, cloud computing and big data, mobile, risk monitor and security management, e-commerce and individual, urban emergency and production emergency, and secrecy security products. It serves government, education, military, emergency response, telecommunication, finance, energy, transportation, health care, and manufacturing sectors. Bluedon Information Security Technologies Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

300300.SZ.summary: Strait Innovation Internet Co., Ltd. engages in the design, consultation, and implementation of intelligent and information system integration projects in China. The company's activities include analysis of the overall framework of smart cities; smart city research planning and project consulting; smart city platform construction and development implementation; smart city service outsourcing and operation and maintenance; smart city integrated services; smart city overall contract; and internet financial ecosystem. It also provides smart medical services, such as remote consultation, medical technology, medical management, medical investment, medical insurance, and chronic disease management services; and engages in the strategic investment activities. The company was formerly known as Hakim Unique Internet Co., Ltd. Strait Innovation Internet Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300348.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Sunline Tech Co., Ltd. operates as a banking software and technology services company worldwide. It offers core banking, digital banking, credit risk management, and bank card business solutions, as well as financial big data analytics and total value management systems. The company also provides a range of services, such as IT planning and consultation, IT operations and maintenance, banking system tests, hardware installation and migration, and training services. It offers its solutions to banks, insurance companies, and unit trusts. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300468.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Forms Syntron Information Co., Ltd.
300468.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Forms Syntron Information Co., Ltd. provides enterprise-class software products and solutions to financial institutions in China and internationally. It primarily offers products and solutions for blockchain and platform universe, as well as Lego banking products, such as iLoan, iSaving, and iWealth. The company also provides consumer finance loan core and credit approval systems, and Internet retail credit platform; and channel products and solutions comprising unified payment gateway, branch sales, personal online banking, mobile banking, faster payment systems, corporate Internet banking, mobile account opening, and smart branch terminal. In addition, it offers management products and solutions, including decision support, risk management, financial management, management accounting system, process monitoring, abnormal transaction monitoring, customer management, and customer transaction management. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300598.SZ.summary: ArcherMind Technology (Nanjing) Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of embedded software technologies in the fields of smart phones, intelligent cars and hardware, artificial intelligence, and mobile Internet in the United States, Germany, Japan, India, and internationally. The company offers software development services, including system tailoring, system optimization, peripheral component integration development, framework customization and optimization, native system problem fixes, and operator requirements customization. It also provides interactive designing services, such as VI, handheld game, Web, product concept interactive, and ID design; GUI, UE, WUI, CI, and other icons and interface design; 3D effects; vector diagrams; flash dynamic effects; and other professional design, as well as software testing services. The company serves various Fortune Global 500 companies. ArcherMind Technology (Nanjing) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

300605.SZ.summary: Hengfeng Information Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a smart city information technology service provider in China. The company provides smart city industry solutions for customers in the fields of urban services, public safety, and people's livelihood. It offers design consultation, software development, system integration and management, and operation and maintenance services. The company also provides smart government software, smart building software, industry software, IOT products, smart city operation management platform, and smart retirement solutions. Hengfeng Information Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

300674.SZ.summary: Yusys Technologies Co., Ltd. provides IT solutions to banking-based financial institutions in China. It offers consulting, software products, user experience design, software development and implementation, operation and maintenance, test, and system integration services. The company provides business products for core banking system, financial intermediations, and credit operation systems; channel products for channel management systems, counter systems, mobile banking, direct banking, telephone bank/call center, and self-service banking; and management products for back-office management solutions, business intelligence, and customer relationship management. Yusys Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300730.SZ.long_name: Hunan Creator Information Technologies CO., LTD.
300730.SZ.summary: Hunan Creator Information Technologies CO., LTD. provides information services for government and enterprise customers in China. It also offers software development, system integration, and IT operation and maintenance services. The company provides services in the areas of cloud computing, big data, artificial intelligence, and mobile Internet. Its products include basic platform that covers proprietary cloud, big data, capability open, portal resource unified management, machine vision development, and universal sensor data acquisition platforms; government software solutions, which cover government services, work together, urban governance, and industry regulation; and enterprise software solutions comprising electronic channel, business management, production inspection, and medical and education software. The company also provides cloud/data center infrastructure integration, network and security integration, unified communications integration, database/middleware integration, and system tuning services; and IT infrastructure, weak current engineering, and desktop operation and maintenance services. In addition, it offers consulting services for smart city construction, industry applications, and informatization projects, as well as private cloud planning consulting services. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.

300738.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Aofei Data Technology Co., Ltd.
300738.SZ.summary: Guangdong Aofei Data Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the data center and communication integrated operation businesses in China. It offers server hosting and rental, professional cloud computing and big data application, and BGP interconnection services. The company is based in Guangzhou, China.

300810.SZ.long_name: Beijing Zhongkehaixun Digital S&T Co., Ltd.
300810.SZ.summary: Beijing Zhongkehaixun Digital S&T Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of related products in the sonar field. It provides signal processing platforms, sonar systems, underwater acoustic big data and simulation systems, unmanned anti-submarine systems, and other related products to military customers. The company is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

300846.SZ.summary: Capitalonline Data Service Co., Ltd. provides cloud computing services. It also offers IDC hosting and IT value-added, IT outsourcing, communication integration, and other information services for e-commerce, gaming, finance, big data, medical, PaaS/SaaS, and various other industries. The company operates in Beijing and Wuxi, China; Hong Kong; Taipei, Taiwan; Dallas, Los Angeles, and New York, the United States; Tokyo, Japan; Singapore; Frankfurt, Germany; Amsterdam, the Netherlands, and internationally. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300872.SZ.summary: Tansun Technology Co., Ltd. provides long-term information technology (IT) solutions and services for financial industry customers in China and internationally. It offers supply chain finance consulting services, transaction banking solutions, integrated risk management systems, retail bank IT architecture consulting services, retail credit product delivery systems, business consulting and joint operating platforms, performance management consulting solutions, business intelligence and big data applications, micro service container cloud platforms, and workflow engines. The company also provides TREE, a financial business application; professional IT planning consultation and project implementation services; and wind control models for retail credit business, such as credit granting, lending, and post-lending. In addition, it offers risk control, open banking, and data governance solutions, as well as industrial financial platforms; automated testing, non-functional testing, big data platform testing, data migration validation, and demand labeling solutions, as well as testing consultation services. It serves central banks, political banks, state-owned banks, joint-stock banks, local commercial banks, and non-banking financial institutions. Tansun Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Lhasa, China.

300925.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Farben Information Technology Co.,Ltd. provides software technology services and solutions worldwide. It offers solutions in the areas of personalized systems, data warehouse upgrade, data management analysis, E-commerce website, data management platform management, and big data platform building. The company also offers IT, consulting, cloud, and product development services. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

3680.HK.summary: Suoxinda Holdings Limited develops and delivers data and artificial intelligence solutions to the banks and financial institutions in the People's Republic of China and Hong Kong. Its data solutions include software development, data analysis, and system integration and customization services, as well as data integration, storage, cleaning, and processing services. The company also provides Suoxinda precision marketing solution, risk management solution, intelligent label solution, customer voice solution, and supply chain management solution, as well as portrait solution. In addition, it operates marketing management platform, anti-fraud platform, and label management platform; and offers decision engine product, a component embedded in the application program. Further, the company provides consulting services for deep learning, natural language processing, image recognition, data modeling and analysis, data governance, and data visualization technology. Additionally, it sells software and hardware products; offers installation of equipment and software; and provides information technology maintenance and support services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

600751.SS.summary: HNA Technology Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, provides IT distribution and supply chain services. It provides HNA cloud and artificial intelligence platform, as well as technology solutions. The company was formerly known as Tianjin Tianhai Investment Co., Ltd and changed its name to HNA Technology Co., Ltd. in April 2018. HNA Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

600797.SS.summary: Insigma Technology Co., Ltd. operates as an information technology consulting and service company in China. The company offers architecture design, software development, software and hardware integration, business process outsourcing, operation and maintenance, cloud computing, big data, artificial intelligence generation, and contracting engineering services. It serves industries, such as big traffic, big financial, big health, and case show. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Natural Technology Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Insigma Technology Co., Ltd. in 2001. Insigma Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

603138.SS.summary: Beijing Vastdata Technology Co., Ltd. provides data technology services in China. It offers data storage and security, database and data management, data audit, database machine, cloud integration, and other related services, as well as database as a service cloud platform. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

603559.SS.summary: Zhongtong Guomai Communication Co., Ltd. primarily provides communications network engineering consulting services. The company also involved in the construction of intelligent building projects, and installation and service of cable television projects, as well as survey, design and construction, and communication network system activities. The company was founded in 1947 and is based in Changchun, China.

603881.SS.summary: Shanghai AtHub Co., Ltd. provides Internet infrastructure services in China and internationally. It offers wholesale data center services that are primarily based on the complex and diverse application deployment requirements of large data center users, such as large Internet companies or financial institutions; and customized planning, design, system integration, and operations management services to end users. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Shanghai, China.

605398.SS.long_name: Shanghai New Centurion Network Information Technology Co., Ltd.
605398.SS.summary: Shanghai New Centurion Network Information Technology Co., Ltd. provides information technology services in China. It offers third-party engineering, operation, and maintenance services; sells original hardware, and software and service; and develops software products. The company is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

65U.F.summary: China Customer Relations Centers, Inc. provides business process outsourcing services for transportation, e-commerce, banks and insurance, and telecommunications companies in the People's Republic of China. It offers voice-based and online-based customer care services, including customer relationship management, technical support, sales, customer retention, marketing surveys, and research, as well as artificial intelligence customer care services. The company also provides employee leasing outsourcing services to clients. China Customer Relations Centers, Inc. was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Taian, the People's Republic of China.

688080.SS.long_name: Beijing InHand Networks Technology Co., Ltd.
688080.SS.summary: Beijing InHand Networks Technology Co., Ltd. provides industrial Internet of things (IoT) systems and solutions. The company provides IoT edge computing gateways, industrial LTE routers, vehicle gateways, industrial modems, industrial computers, industrial Ethernet switches, and IoT management platforms, as well as inconnect secure remote connection cloud services. It offers IoT solutions for smart grid, smart manufacturing, transportation, healthcare, Retail, environment, smart city, remote machine monitoring, smart vending, and energy markets. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, China.

688088.SS.summary: ArcSoft Corporation Limited operates as an algorithm and software solution provider in the computer vision industry worldwide. It offers image and video solutions for front and rear-facing smartphone cameras to assist phone manufacturers; camera solutions, including performance optimizations, network SDKs, and full customizable applications for various platforms; motion sensing controller solutions; refrigerator software; automobile digital video recorders solutions; projector solutions; and live video broadcasting apps. The company is based in Hangzhou, China.

688100.SS.summary: Willfar Information Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells utility measurement equipment. The company offers meter data management terminals, smart water meters, smart gas meters, electric power distribution indicator, and electrical energy efficiency management, as well as energy saving products, such as solar powered lights. Willfar Information Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Changsha, China. Willfar Information Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Wasion Group Holdings.

688500.SS.summary: HCR Co., Ltd. provides various data intelligence solutions in China. It offers solutions in field of data insight and focusing on the essence of business. The company assists the government to enhance the efficiency of management; and help enterprises to enhance efficiency and increase the revenue, make accurate decision, and reshape their business with the whole data driven and the artificial intelligence. It serves automobile, internet technology, consumer durable, healthcare, industrial sector, tourism, public affairs, telecom, retail, FMCG, finance, tobacco, environmental protection, and education industries. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Beijing, China.

8235.HK.summary: CCID Consulting Company Limited provides consulting services in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Management and Strategic Consultancy Services, Market Consultancy Services, Information Engineering Supervision Services, and Other segments. The Management and Strategic Consultancy Services segment offers services, which include the application and implementation of enterprise management information digitalization; and planning, operation, management, and investments for industrial parks. It incorporates the functions of business process re-engineering, enterprise resource planning, customer relationship management, supply chain management, call center and other electronic business pattern designs, marketing, brand name promotion, public relationship, and advertising. The Market Consultancy Services segment provides standard research on specific sectors and tailor-made research services. The Information Engineering Supervision Services segment offers information engineering supervision services to the undertaken projects. The Other segment provides data information design, training courses, and subscription to interaction system services. It also offers investment and economic consultancy, and industry spatial management services. CCID Consulting Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

900938.SS.summary: HNA Technology Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, provides IT distribution and supply chain services. It provides HNA cloud and artificial intelligence platform, as well as technology solutions. The company was formerly known as Tianjin Tianhai Investment Co., Ltd and changed its name to HNA Technology Co., Ltd. in April 2018. HNA Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

CCRC.summary: China Customer Relations Centers, Inc. provides business process outsourcing services for transportation, e-commerce, banks and insurance, and telecommunications companies in the People's Republic of China. It offers voice-based and online-based customer care services, including customer relationship management, technical support, sales, customer retention, marketing surveys, and research. China Customer Relations Centers, Inc. was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Taian, the People's Republic of China.

CD.summary: Chindata Group Holdings Limited provides carrier-neutral hyper scale data center solutions in China, India, and Southeast Asia. It offers artificial intelligence, cloud computing, smart cities and homes, online entertainment, and other on-demand services. The company also provides internet data center colocation and rental services; and technical and consulting services. Its integrated data center solutions include infrastructure, power supply, connectivity and operation and maintenance, tailor-made to their scale and requirements throughout the planning, design, construction and operation process. The company was formerly known as BCPE Bridge Stack Limited and changed its name to Chindata Group Holdings Limited in April 2020. Chindata Group Holdings Limited was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

CF9.F.summary: Capinfo Company Limited provides information technology (IT) services in the People's Republic of China. It offers online application and system integration, software development, data processing, information professional, IT planning and consulting, IT construction implementation, IT operation and maintenance, IT outsourcing, and value added services. The company also provides various industry solutions, including e-government, health care, community service, urban transportation, housing fund, public security, and cloud service solutions. Capinfo Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

CFTLF.summary: Chinasoft International Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops and provides information technology (IT) solutions, IT outsourcing, and training services. It operates through Technical Professional Services Group and Internet IT Services Group segments. The company offers CloudEasy, a cloud management platform; Huaxia Cloud, a cloud brokerage platform; Tencent Cloud that provides cloud consultation, migration, operation and maintenance management, and application development and integration; enterprise cloud disk; and cloud shop O2O platform, as well as ResourceOne, TopLink/TSA+, and Ark big data middleware platforms. It also provides IT application development and maintenance, IT testing, infrastructure management, product development and services, digital consulting and implementation, system integration and services, IT consulting and outsourcing, business process outsourcing, and other customer services. In addition, the company offers Internet IT services comprising software industry Internet platform, SaaS, and shared services; and trades in software and hardware products. It serves financial institution, banks, insurance and securities, retail, telecommunications and Internet, high-technology business, manufacturing, transportation, public utilities, and other industries, as well as to the government in the People's Republic of China, the United States, Japan, Malaysia, India, and internationally. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

CN6.F.long_name: BII Railway Transportation Technology Holdings Company Limited
CN6.F.summary: BII Railway Transportation Technology Holdings Company Limited, an investment holding company, designs, produces, implements, sells, and maintains application solutions in the People's Republic of China. The company's Intelligent Railway Transportation segment designs, produces, implements, sells, and maintains application solution services, including related software, hardware, and spare parts in railway transportation areas; sells hardware and spare parts relating to railway transportation application solution systems; and repairs and maintains application solution systems. Its products include passenger info systems, auto fare collection system, automatic fare collection clearing center, and traffic control center. The company's Infrastructure information segment offers civil communication transmission services and related software, hardware and spare parts in utility tunnel areas. Its Business Development Investment segment manages the equity investments in railway transportation areas. The company was formerly known as China City Railway Transportation Technology Holdings Company Limited and changed its name to BII Railway Transportation Technology Holdings Company Limited in August 2017. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China. BII Railway Transportation Technology Holdings Company Limited is a subsidiary of Beijing Infrastructure Investment (Hong Kong) Limited.

CNG1.F.summary: TD Holdings, Inc. focuses on the new commodities trading business. The company was formerly known as Bat Group, Inc. and changed its name to TD Holdings, Inc. in March 2020. TD Holdings, Inc. is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

DRGV.summary: Dragon Capital Group, Corp., through its subsidiaries, provides software solutions for businesses primarily in the People's Republic of China and the United States. It offers various software applications, including network software, gas pipeline risk assessment system, e-business software development, financial and enterprise information management systems, and computerized automation control applications for commercial and residential buildings, commercial third-generation wireless applications, and mobile business solutions, and multi imaging applications. The company develops commercial 3G wireless applications and mobile business solutions for the human resources, mobile banking, food, beverage, and entertainment industries. In addition, it provides an ERS software system for enterprises to manage accounting, distribution, inventory, and sales; and sells and distributes electronic equipments and devices, and technology solutions to financial institutions, telecommunication companies, hospitals, supermarkets, airports, railway stations, and various government agencies. Additionally, it provides support services in general business consulting, formation of joint ventures, access to capital markets, merger and acquisition transactions consulting, business valuation, and revenue growth strategies. The company was formerly known as Dragon Venture and changed its name to Dragon Capital Group, Corp. in March 2005. Dragon Capital Group, Corp. was incorporated in 1977 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

G40.F.summary: GDS Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops and operates data centers in the People's Republic of China. The company provides colocation, managed hosting, and managed cloud services, as well as consulting services to the cloud, internet and banking industries. The company serves cloud service providers, Internet companies, financial institutions, telecommunications and IT service providers, and large domestic private sector and multinational corporations. The company has a strategic partnership with GIC Private Limited to develop and operate hyperscale build-to-suit data centers in China. GDS Holdings Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

G401.F.summary: GDS Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops and operates data centers in the People's Republic of China. The company provides colocation, managed hosting, and managed cloud services, as well as consulting services to the cloud, internet and banking industries. The company serves cloud service providers, Internet companies, financial institutions, telecommunications and IT service providers, and large domestic private sector and multinational corporations. The company has a strategic partnership with GIC Private Limited to develop and operate hyperscale build-to-suit data centers in China. GDS Holdings Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

GDS.summary: GDS Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops and operates data centers in the People's Republic of China. The company provides colocation, managed hosting, and managed cloud services, as well as consulting services to the cloud, internet and banking industries. The company serves cloud service providers, Internet companies, financial institutions, telecommunications and IT service providers, and large domestic private sector and multinational corporations. The company has a strategic partnership with GIC Private Limited to develop and operate hyperscale build-to-suit data centers in China. GDS Holdings Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

GLG.summary: TD Holdings, Inc. focuses on the new commodities trading business. The company was formerly known as Bat Group, Inc. and changed its name to TD Holdings, Inc. in March 2020. TD Holdings, Inc. is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

HCI.SG.summary: HC Group Inc., an investment holding company, provides business information services through online and offline channels in the People's Republic of China. It operates through Technology-Driven New Retail, Smart Industries, Platform and Corporate Services, and O2O Business Exhibition Centre segments. The company provides industrial internet trading platform and advertising services through B2B website hc360.com; online advertising and IT-related products information services through zol.com.cn; and B2B2C retail of electronics products. It also offers Union Cotton, a spot transaction platform for cotton; ibuychem.com, a B2B trading platform for chemical rubber and plastics industry; efu.com.cn for apparel retail; Z-SCM, a proprietary supply chain management system for enterprises; B2B e-business service for household appliances; nahuomall.com, an integrated service platform for home appliance stores; and design, installation, maintenance, refurbishment, supply chain finance, and sub-leasing and leasing services for construction formwork industry under the Zhongmo International name. In addition, the company provides Software as a Service in 3C industrial internet and new technology retail solutions; cross-industrial integrated marketing and advertising services; anti-counterfeiting products and services; and financing services, including micro-credit and lease financing, and factoring services. Further, it constructs, rents, manages, and sells properties; and hosts exhibitions and seminars, as well as offers loans, trading and agency services, and construction equipment rental services. The company was formerly known as HC International, Inc. and changed its name to HC Group Inc. in July 2018. HC Group Inc. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

TSYHF.summary: TravelSky Technology Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides information technology solutions for aviation and travel industry in the People's Republic of China. It primarily offers aviation information technology (AIT), distribution information technology, accounting, settlement, and clearing services. The company's AIT services consist of electronic travel distribution services, including inventory control system, computer reservation system, and airport passenger processing system services, as well as other related information technology solutions. It also provides cargo management services, as well as sells and installs related information systems; computer hardware and software development, and data network services; and computer system engineering design and installation services. TravelSky Technology Limited was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

TSYHY.summary: TravelSky Technology Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides information technology solutions for aviation and travel industry in the People's Republic of China. It primarily offers aviation information technology (AIT), distribution information technology, accounting, settlement, and clearing services. The company's AIT services consist of electronic travel distribution services, including inventory control system, computer reservation system, and airport passenger processing system services, as well as other related information technology solutions. It also provides cargo management services, as well as sells and installs related information systems; computer hardware and software development, and data network services; and computer system engineering design and installation services. TravelSky Technology Limited was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

TVL.F.summary: TravelSky Technology Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides information technology solutions for aviation and travel industry in the People's Republic of China. It primarily offers aviation information technology (AIT), distribution information technology, accounting, settlement, and clearing services. The company's AIT services consist of electronic travel distribution services, including inventory control system, computer reservation system, and airport passenger processing system services, as well as other related information technology solutions. It also provides cargo management services, as well as sells and installs related information systems; computer hardware and software development, and data network services; and computer system engineering design and installation services. TravelSky Technology Limited was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

VNET.summary: 21Vianet Group, Inc., an investment holding company, provides hosting and related services to Internet companies, government entities, blue-chip enterprises, and small-to mid-sized enterprises in the People's Republic of China. It offers hosting and related services to house servers and networking equipment in its data centers, and connects them through a data transmission network. The company's hosting and related services include managed hosting services that offer data center space to house its customers' servers and networking equipment, and provide tailored server administration services; and interconnectivity services that enable customers to connect their servers with internet backbones and other networks through its border gateway protocol network or single-line, dual-line, or multiple-line network. Its hosting and related services also comprise cloud services that enable businesses to run their applications over the internet using its IT infrastructure; virtual private network services; hybrid IT Services, which provide customers with a complete package of infrastructure service offerings; and other value-added services, such as firewall, server load balancing, data backup and recovery, data center management, server management, and backup server services. In addition, the company provides traffic charts and analysis, gateway monitoring for servers, domain name system setup, defense mechanism against distributed denial of service attacks, basic setting of switches and routers, and virus protections; and managed network service. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 32 self-built data centers housing 49,876 cabinets and 52 partnered data centers housing with 3,677 cabinets. It has a strategic partnership with Microsoft Corporation. 21Vianet Group, Inc. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.
